group_1.textCenter: Karin? I'm not really feeling your Halloween@spirit.

group_1.narration: Even though I'm the Magical Girl born@of Halloween, Kaede pointed out that@I don't have much Halloween spirit...

group_1.textCenter: It's about the Halloween event we're going to@be holding soon...
They're thinking of putting on a play for it.

group_1.narration: So when Grandma told me about the play,@I thought it was my chance to fix that.

group_1.textCenter: (There's the knight, the cow, the wolf,@the demon girl...)
(I've got the stage sorted but no actors...)
I shouldn't have even said yes in the first@place...

group_1.textRight: Is everything all right?
Hmm, that's a good question...
I'm on the Kamihama Rescue Squad. I @save people from Witches.

group_1.textLeft: Witches...@Are you a Magical Girl too?
How did you know I'm a Magical Girl?

group_1.textRight: Your ring.
It's a dead giveaway to other Magical Girls.@You could even call it our symbol.
You just need to look for a ring on a girl's@middle finger to figure it out.
So, what's got you sighing?
Is there a Witch you can't beat? If that's@what it is, I don't mind helping.

group_1.textLeft: No, that's...not it... I wouldn't say I can't@"beat" this problem...

group_1.textRight: No need to be ashamed. I wouldn't mind@taking care of it for you.
I am Sasara Minagi, the Magical Knight.

group_1.textLeft: That's it! A knight... A knight in shining@armor!

group_1.textRight: [chara:300400:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yes, you're exactly what I was picturing!

group_1.textRight: Um, sorry, I don't... I don't really get what@you're saying...

group_1.textLeft: Please, please I really want you to help me!

group_1.textRight: Haha, so you need an actor.
All right, I'll do it.
Getting people out of binds like this is just@another one of my knightly duties.
And I can't exactly turn down a role where@I get to play a knight, now can I?
I'd be happy to play the part for you, @if you'll have me.

group_1.textLeft: It's like a big weight's been lifted off my@shoulders...

group_1.textRight: So that's what the sighs were for.

group_1.textLeft: I still have to find people to play the other@parts, though...

group_1.textRight: What roles do you need to fill?

group_1.textLeft: Two minions, a cow and a wolf. Oh, and the@demon girl who rules them.

group_1.textRight: Hmm...
[chara:300401:lipSynch_0][chara:300401:lipSynch_1]Okay.
I may know the perfect girl to play the@cow...
Yes. I'll call her right now.
